summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Conference Management System - all core features working perfectly. Backend APIs (17/17 tests passed) and Frontend UI (9/9 tests passed) are fully functional with JWT authentication, role-based access control, and complete CRUD operations for Users, Contacts, and Companies.

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility
design_issues.impact: Accessibility warning only - no functional impact

passed_tests: JWT Authentication with demo credentials (admin@demo.com / admin123)
Protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
Dashboard statistics display correctly (users, contacts, companies, events)
User Management CRUD operations with role assignment
Contact Management CRUD operations with all fields
Role-based access control (Super Admin can access User Management)
Frontend login form and authentication flow
